00055   void pushBack4(unsigned int toPart, const Cell& v, GainMgr& gainMgr)
00056   {
00057     const unsigned int i_v = &v - _cellList;
00058     std::vector<short> gainV(getNumPartitions());
00059     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); k++) {
00060       gainV[k] = _gain[k][i_v];
00061     }
00062     gainMgr.pushBack(toPart, i_v, &gainV[0]);
00063   }
